sentences.en: A photographer recorded the scene on video for posterity.
sentences.cn: 摄影师用摄像机为后代记录下了这个场景。

sentences.cn: 一名技师把一盒录影带装进其中一台机器。

sentences.en: He is hawking around a 15-minute, £5,000 promotional video.

sentences.en: I'd rather see it at the pictures than on video anyway.
sentences.cn: 我本来就宁可去电影院看，而不是看录像。

sentences.en: Let’s stay at home and watch a video.
sentences.cn: 我们待在家里看录像吧。

sentences.en: Many adults still depend on their children to work the video.
sentences.cn: 很多成年人仍然要靠孩子来操作录像机。

sentences.en: Now and again he'd join in when we were playing video games.
sentences.cn: 我们玩电子游戏时，他偶尔会和我们一起玩。

sentences.en: Pirate copies of the video are already said to be in Britain.
sentences.cn: 该录像带的盗版版本据说已在英国出现。

sentences.en: Rewind the video right to the beginning.
sentences.cn: 把录像倒退到开头部分。

sentences.en: Stricter controls were placed on the content of video films.
sentences.cn: 对录像片内容实行了更为严格的监管。

sentences.en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

sentences.en: The school will be making a video of the play.
sentences.cn: 学校将把这出戏拍摄成录像。

sentences.en: The video explains in simple terms how the new tax works.
sentences.cn: 录像用简单易懂的语言解释了新税法。

sentences.en: The video was seven minutes of high camp and melodrama.
sentences.cn: 那段录像里是7分钟极尽夸张搞笑的闹剧表演。

sentences.en: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework.
sentences.cn: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。

sentences.en: Two out of every three Britons already own a video recorder.
sentences.cn: 每3个英国人中就有两个已经有了录像机。
